allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add QWERTY keyboard layout design document

Detailed design for keyboard extension with KeyboardKit integration:
- Full QWERTY layout with autocomplete and persistent mic button
- App Group communication protocol for keyboard-host coordination
- Background audio recording with UIBackgroundModes
- State machine for dictation flow \(arm → listen → process → insert\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
